tool_description: An API showing all climate change news from UK, Australia, USA
name: Climate Change Tutorial
title: Climate Change Tutorial

api_list.name: Get individual news
api_list.description: Get individual news from more newspaper websites
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-tutorial3.p.rapidapi.com/news/theguardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-tutorial3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-tutorial3.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-tutorial3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Climate Change news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about climate change
